output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF 11240017 PSD GIURGIU SENAT" is present at the end of the post.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Directly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is one of the presidential candidates (Poziția nr. 3).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - This is a paid advertisement targeting a large audience (70,000-79,999 impressions) and specifically addresses farmers ("Doamnelor și domnilor fermieri").
4. Electoral objective: Yes - The post presents Marcel Ciolacu as "Noul președinte" and makes promises about what will happen after his "investire", clearly attempting to influence voters by presenting future benefits.
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly a campaign message with promises and political agenda, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an official party communication (PSD Giurgiu) with electoral promises and campaign messaging.
Key problematic elements: - Refers to Marcel Ciolacu as "Noul președinte" before elections - Makes campaign promises about irrigation systems - Uses party slogans ("PSD este calea sigură pentru România") - Has official CMF number indicating campaign material

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It's an official party communication with CMF number - Makes specific promises about post-election actions - Presents a presidential candidate in a leadership position - Uses campaign slogans and messaging - Makes direct promises to voters - Is a paid advertisement reaching a large audience
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Giurgiu, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea campaniei electorale pentru alegerile prezidențiale, prin distribuirea după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 a unei postări sponsorizate (ID: 1411711393139703) care îl prezintă pe candidatul Marcel Ciolacu ca "Noul președinte" și face promisiuni electorale specifice despre sistemul de irigații. Postarea are scop electoral explicit, folosește număr CMF (11240017), include sloganuri de campanie ("PSD este calea sigură pentru România"), și face promisiuni directe către alegători despre acțiunile post-electorale, având un impact direct asupra procesului electoral prezidențial prin influențarea votului în favoarea candidatului PSD.
